semantic_persona_contract.title: Semantic Persona Contribution Agreement (Draft v1)
clauses: 1. Contributor retains attribution rights for any semantic insight provided.
2. Any AI training system must log contributor_id and timestamp for provenance tracking.
3. Reuse of user insights in commercial LLMs must be explicitly cited.
4. Contributor may claim recognition in academic or commercial citation formats.
5. If insight contributes to a model used in paid deployment, contributor may negotiate royalty or compensation.
